text: José Ribas (born 1 October 1899, date of death unknown) was an Argentine long- distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1932 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1899 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1932 Summer Olympics Category:Argentine male long-distance runners Category:Argentine male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Argentina Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo
title: José Ribas
